name: typescript-patterns
description: This repository contains a basic structure to learn good practices of Typescript, as well as some Design Patterns alongside the AWS SAM framework.

scripts.deploy: npm run sam:build && npm run sam:package && npm run sam:deploy
scripts.quality: npm audit && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --template-file .aws-sam/build/packaged-template.yaml --s3-bucket typescript-patterns-dojo-assets --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --stack-name cabulosos-ts --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
